PSCT.Base: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Set 1 Continuous Trap from your hand or GY. It can be activated this turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can activate this effect; face-up Traps you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects, until the end of the next turn.
